backend/main.mo: Defines the canister’s core data models for books, journal entries, sessions, progress, rituals, and user profiles, plus a preset book list and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions mirroring the actor’s state and a no-op migration function that returns the existing data unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, React Query client, theming, identity provider, and top-level page routes.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive carousel for selecting ambient music with swipe navigation, volume control, and audio playback management.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating side navigation with animated icons, hover labels, and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile menu sheet providing theme toggle, account actions, and navigation, with auth‑aware logout handling.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Defines the 3D lotus model with petal geometry, animated growth, breathing, and glow effects based on the lotus growth state.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Renders animated particle effects around a lotus using three.js, switching between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus and particle effect responsive to theme, variant, and intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Swipeable meditation selector carousel with circular navigation and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, transitions, and parsed content sections.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that routes to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl visualization showing meditation minutes as an animated liquid fill, styled per theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Renders a 3D lotus visualization using React Three Fiber, with lighting, particle effects, and growth state–driven animation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Draws an animated SVG lotus whose colors, glow, and petal motion respond to growth metrics, streaks, and breathing animations.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Implements a multi‑step quiz dialog that records answers, navigates between questions, and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Displays saved rituals in a swipeable or clickable carousel with support for starting or deleting rituals and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login or guest status with actions to log out or return home, clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, handling login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
Hook for persisting a boolean state to localStorage with SSR-safe initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching meditation data, handling sessions, quotes, and guest-mode fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports static meditation book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Displays a swipeable, circular carousel of book recommendations with theme toggle, navigation, and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows daily quotes, meditation options, saved rituals, and navigation with theme toggling and quiz-driven recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Provides journal entry browsing, filtering, editing, favoriting, deleting, and import/export of meditation data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with theme toggle, login via Internet Identity, guest mode, and redirect to the dashboard if authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-meditation setup page with mood/energy inputs, ambient sound selection, detailed guides, and session/ritual saving.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: React page showing meditation progress with stats, rank info, data import/export, and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Implements a lotus growth visualization model mapping total meditation minutes to layered petal, glow, and particle parameters.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Handles guest-mode localStorage for journal entries, progress data, rituals, and migration from legacy keys.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines meditation rank tiers and helper functions to compute current, next, and remaining minutes for ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and layout with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s versioned state, describing the app’s full feature set including authentication, actor handling, secure URL‑secret flow, RBAC, blob‑storage maintenance, routing, and theming. Serves as a canonical inventory of implemented features across frontend and Motoko backend.
